name: Detention
long: A small classroom filled with empty desks in nice neat rows. There is a large desk at the very front, along with a white board. There is a very angry looking red faced teacher standing behind the desk. There is a large window overlooking a parking lot. There is a closed door marking the exit.
short: An empty room with desks in neat rows. There is a large window and a closed door.
addl: A train whistle sounds across the lonely field.
